item.title: 2016 World Championships winners decided: Wolfe Glick and Shintaro Ito are VGC and TCG Masters ...
item.description: The winners of the 2016 Pokémon World Championships have been decided for the Video Game Championship, Trading Card Game, and Pokkén Tournament.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: 2017 World Championships to be held in Anaheim: To return to the 2006 host city
item.description: The 2017 Pokémon World Championships will be held in Anaheim, California in the United States.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Happy Hour Meowth available for PAL region games: Requires common serial code
item.description: A Meowth that knows the event-exclusive move Happy Hour is now available for PAL region Pokémon X, Y, Omega Ruby, and Alpha Sapphire using the common serial code HAPPY.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Crabrawler, New Pokémon Sun and Moon Trailer Unveiled: Stufful, Sandygast, Palossand also showcased
item.description: Crabrawler, a new Fighting-type Pokémon, was announced earlier today during the opening ceremony of 2016 Pokémon World Championships.
item.author: Adyniz

item.title: Turtonator Announced for Pokémon Sun and Moon: New Pokémon Unveiled at Gamescom
item.description: A new Pokémon named Tortunator has been announced at Gamescom 2016.
item.author: Adyniz

item.title: Pokémon Ranger: Guardian Signs available on Wii U Virtual Console in North America: Costs $9.99
item.description: Pokémon Ranger: Guardian Signs is now available on the Wii U Virtual Console in North America.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Nicole Perlman and Alex Hirsch reportedly writing Detective Pikachu movie: Co-writer of ...
item.description: Variety's Justin Kroll reports that Legendary and Universal may have their scriptwriters for the upcoming Detective Pikachu movie.
item.author: PikaSleep

item.title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky to be released on Wii U Virtual Console in Europe: ...
item.description: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky will be released on Wii U Virtual Console in Europe on August 18, 2016, alongside Pokémon Snap.
item.author: Hope(N Forever)

item.title: Pokémon Snap to be released on Wii U Virtual Console in Europe, Australia: To be released August 18
item.description: Pokémon Snap will be released on Wii U Virtual Console in Europe on August 18, 2016 and in Australia on August 19, 2016.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: "The Island of Pokémon" event announced for France: To be held on September 10 in Puteaux
item.description: A Pokémon event will be held in Puteaux (Paris-La Défense, France) on September 10, 2016, with Puteaux Island turned into a Pokémon village.
item.author: Jdsaphir

item.title: Movies 4, 5, 7 multi-movie release coming to UK: To be released August 29
item.description: Miramax and StudioCanal will release the Pokémon Triple Movie Collection on DVD on August 29, 2016.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: New Pokémon, Alola Forms, Team Skull details revealed: Further details of CoroCoro information
item.description: A new trailer for Pokémon Sun and Moon has been released, which features a new Pokémon a new Alola Form, and more details on some information revealed in CoroCoro such as Team Skull.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Shiny Xerneas, Yveltal to be available at gamescom: Available for X, Y, Omega Ruby, Alpha Sapphire
item.description: A code card for Shiny Xerneas and Shiny Yveltal will be available at gamescom in Germany.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: 2nd chance Darkrai to be available for American region games: Will be sent via Trainer Club email
item.description: Darkrai will be available to players who are signed up to the Pokémon Trainer Club newsletter. This Darkrai is being given away so that players who missed out on the 20th anniversary distribution in May have a second chance.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Digital Japanese Ruby & Sapphire chapter volumes available free online for limited time: ...
item.description: Free online access to the Ruby & Sapphire chapter of Pokémon Adventures is available from August 4-11.
item.author: ht14

item.title: Pokémon GO v0.33 patch released: Capture Bonuses, Battery Saver return, nearby Pokémon revamped
item.description: A new patch is available for the freemium mobile game Pokémon GO, bringing it up to version 0.33.0 (labelled 1.3.0 on the iOS App Store).
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: CoroCoro reveals new Alola Forms, new Pokémon: Villainous team revealed
item.description: This month's CoroCoro Comic has revealed a number of new Pokémon and new Alola Forms for Kanto Pokémon.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon GO released in Asia and Oceania: Available for iOS, Android
item.description: The freemium mobile game Pokémon GO is now available for iOS and Android in various countries in Asia and Oceania.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: 3DS themes featuring Substitute, Pair Art available in North America: Pair Art bundle includes ...
item.description: Three Pokémon-themed 3DS Home menu themes are now available in North America.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster

item.title: Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia available for North American Wii U Virtual Console: Costs $9.99
item.description: Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia is now available on the Wii U Virtual Console in North America.
item.author: SnorlaxMonster
